title: He Compliments Everyone But Me
itunes:title: He Compliments Everyone But Me
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 58 and on my second marriage to a man that I only knew 7 months before we got married. He swept me off my feet after I met him at church. We actually met online but we agreed to have our first face to face encounter at church. We spent that entire first day together and into the night. He said he was an expert on beautiful souls and mine was the brightest he’d seen in years....................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 58 and on my second marriage to a man that I only knew 7 months before we got married. He swept me off my feet after I met him at church. We actually met online but we agreed to have our first face to face encounter at church. We spent that entire first day together and into the night. He said he was an expert on beautiful souls and mine was the brightest he’d seen in years....................................
